bug.title: NotificationFixer反射造成的闪退
bug.body: ``` Caused by: java.lang.NoSuchFieldException: type at java.lang.Class.getField(Class.java:724) at com.lody.virtual.helper.utils.Reflect.field0(Reflect.java:306) at com.lody.virtual.helper.utils.Reflect.field(Reflect.java:294) at com.lody.virtual.helper.utils.Reflect.get(Reflect.java:282) at com.lody.virtual.server.notification.NotificationFixer.fixRemoteViewActions(NotificationFixer.java:150) at com.lody.virtual.server.notification.NotificationCompatCompatV14.dealNotification(NotificationCompatCompatV14.java:45) at com.lody.virtual.client.ipc.VNotificationManager.dealNotification(VNotificationManager.java:41) at com.lody.virtual.client.hook.proxies.am.MethodProxies$SetServiceForeground.call(MethodProxies.java:696) at com.lody.virtual.client.hook.base.MethodInvocationStub$HookInvocationHandler.invoke(MethodInvocationStub.java:186) at $Proxy3.setServiceForeground(Native Method) at java.lang.reflect.Method.invokeNative(Native Method) at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:515) at com.lody.virtual.client.hook.base.MethodInvocationStub$HookInvocationHandler.invoke(MethodInvocationStub.java:189) at $Proxy33.setServiceForeground(Native Method) at android.app.Service.startForeground(Service.java:643) at com.cyjh.elfin.services.PhoneStateService.initNotification(PhoneStateService.java:71) at com.cyjh.elfin.services.PhoneStateService.onCreate(PhoneStateService.java:50) at android.app.ActivityThread.handleCreateService(ActivityThread.java:2570) at android.app.ActivityThread.access$1800(ActivityThread.java:135) at android.app.ActivityThread$H.handleMessage(ActivityThread.java:1278) at android.os.Handler.dispatchMessage(Handler.java:102) at android.os.Looper.loop(Looper.java:136) at android.app.ActivityThread.main(ActivityThread.java:5019) at java.lang.reflect.Method.invokeNative(Native Method) ```
